description: Tightening lines can be awkward, stressful and even dangerous. The ingenious Figure 9 Carbiner Rope Tightener takes the worry out of it by allowing you to tighten and secure cord in both looped and straight line configurations. Great for tying objects to a roof rack or securing loads in a truck. The steel-gate carabiner adds versatility and convenience by attaching to any fixed anchor point.Tough aluminum construction.Can be used to tension a loop (two unsecured ends) or a rope with a fixed end.Carabiner attaches to any fixed anchor point.Large fits rope sizes 3mm to 9mm.Small fits rope sizes 2mm to 5mm.Maximum gate width (Large): 3/4" (19mm).Maximum gate width (Small): 3/8" (9mm).Load limit (Large): 67.5kg (150lbs).Load limit (Small): 22.5kg (50lbs).Dimensions (Large): 116 x 56.4 x 12.8mmDimensions (Small): 68.6 X 33.5 X 7.7mmNot for use where disengagement could result in bodily injury or property damage.Not for climbing.Avoid sharp edges, hot or abrasive surfaces, and shifting loads.
name: Nite Ize Figure 9 Carabiner Rope Tightener
